items.summary: Update the post-"Yes" flow so that after the user clicks "Yes! ðŸ’•", the app navigates to a distinct second screen (second page view within the same React app) that prominently displays the title text exactly: "NABIHA SHINWARI LOVE YOU".

Style the title "NABIHA SHINWARI LOVE YOU" in a visually "stylish alphabet" presentation suitable for a big screen (large hero typography, strong contrast, decorative but readable styling), while keeping all other user-facing text in English.

Provide a clear, simple way to proceed from the first post-Yes meme screen to the second title screen (e.g., a "Next"/"Continue" button), without breaking the existing romantic theme and background pattern.
